import Mathlib

open Set MeasureTheory

/-- Let U âŠ† â„^n be open and f : U â†’ â„ continuous. Then the graph of f has Lebesgue measure zero in â„^{n+1}. -/
theorem graph_of_continuous_on_has_measure_zero {n : â„•} {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)} {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : ContinuousOn f U) :
  MeasureTheory.volume (Set.image (fun x => (x, f x)) U) = 0 := by sorry
